mapper.select: select * from user where username = #{username} and password = #{password}

select distinct community.name,user.username,user.password,user.sex,user.age,user.academy,user.major from apply left join community on community.community_id=apply.community_id right join user on apply.user_id=user.user_id where apply.status=1 limit #{curRow},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from apply where status = 1
mapper.update: update position set position.pos_name=#{position} where position.user_id=(select user_id from user where username=#{username})
UPDATE user SET password = #{password} WHERE username = #{username}
